content: stuffed hermit crab amigurumi pattern with a few removable shell options to make it fun to play with pattern includes full crab instructions and assembly as well as 3 different shell patterns shown in the pictures materials - 4 mm crochet hook - worsted weight yarn of your choice - 2 x 6mm safety eyes - tapestry needle - stuffing material bean bag filling and batting can use just one or the other - optional stitch marker stitches chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet decrease - single_crochet 2 together magic_ring half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet puff
